title: Create Social Media Graphics for Game Day
description: A team's social media manager needs to create graphics for game day, including a 'starting lineup' graphic.

tasks.description: Retrieve the official starting lineup for today's game.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the list of starting players.
Agent chooses the correct template from a library.

tasks.description: Populate the template with the player names and headshots.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent automatically generates the final graphic.

tasks.description: Post the graphic to the team's social media accounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully posts the lineup graphic to Twitter and Instagram.
